snippet: The ambassador of the United Arab Emirates writes about a dispute with Iran over Abu Musa.
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''A Tiny Island Is Where Iran Makes a Stand'' (front page, May 1) asserts that the United Arab Emirates recently ''renewed'' its claim to the island of Abu Musa. On the contrary, the U.A.E. has consistently and forcefully protested Iran's illegal occupation from the moment it occurred and during the following decades.

headline.main: The Dispute Over a Persian Gulf Island
